capIsRound.description: If `true`, the cap of the progress indicator will be rounded.

color.description: The color of the progress indicator. Use a color key in the theme object

getValueText.description: A function that returns the desired valueText to use in place of the value

isIndeterminate.description:
If `true`, the progress will be indeterminate and the `value`
prop will be ignored

max.description: Maximum value defining 100% progress made (must be higher than 'min')

min.description: Minimum value defining 'no progress' (must be lower than 'max')

size.description: The size of the circular progress in CSS units

thickness.description: This defines the stroke width of the svg circle.

trackColor.description: The color name of the progress track. Use a color key in the theme object

valueText.description: The desired valueText to use in place of the value

colorScheme.description: The visual color appearance of the component

hasStripe.description: If `true`, the progress bar will show stripe

isAnimated.description: If `true`, and hasStripe is `true`, the stripes will be animated

isIndeterminate.description:
If `true`, the progress will be indeterminate and the `value`
prop will be ignored

max.description: The maximum value of the progress

min.description: The minimum value of the progress

value.description:
The `value` of the progress indicator.
If `undefined` the progress bar will be in `indeterminate` state
